PERSONA:
meet john, a 35-year-old married white man residing in a metropolitan area in the west south central region. he has some college education but no degree. john was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. he identifies as an atheist and does not attend any religious services.

politically, john aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views. he is a registered voter and actively participates in elections. despite his middle-income status, earning between $80,000 and $90,000 annually, john is almost constantly online, likely due to the nature of his work or personal interests.

in his free time, john does not engage in voluntary work or community service activities. he prefers to spend his leisure time pursuing personal hobbies and interests. overall, john is a hardworking, self-reliant individual who values his independence and personal freedoms.
